page.title: 12Antiques in Debenham (2).
page.content: One of the owners of Flemings Antiques is Mr Angus McBean,well-known for his photographs of stage and screen stars. The owners of Guildhall Crafts bought the Tudor building three and a half years ago because it was cheaper than similar properties in Essex.They sell pine furniture that they have stripped themselves and small craft items.Some of the furniture is Victorian,but this is now difficult to obtain. About 60% of the stock at Forester's Hall Antiques is reproduction furniture which is made there and many other items are less than a hundred years old because antiques are in short supply.The owners report a trend for young people to buy old furniture because it is cheaper than modern goods of a similar quality.
